statements: SELECT * FROM ProductionCosts ORDER BY ProductName ASC;
SELECT ProductName, LaborHours FROM ProductionCosts WHERE RawMaterialPrice > 100 ORDER BY RawMaterialPrice DESC;
SELECT ProductID, ProductName FROM ProductionCosts WHERE LaborHours < 10;
SELECT * FROM ProductionCosts WHERE ProductName LIKE 'A%';
SELECT ProductName, RawMaterialPrice FROM ProductionCosts ORDER BY RawMaterialPrice ASC, ProductName DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductionCosts WHERE ProductID = 1;
SELECT ProductName, RawMaterialPrice FROM ProductionCosts WHERE LaborHours > 5 ORDER BY RawMaterialPrice DESC;
SELECT ProductName, RawMaterialPrice, LaborHours FROM ProductionCosts WHERE ProductName LIKE 'P%' ORDER BY ProductName ASC, RawMaterialPrice DESC;
SELECT ProductName, RawMaterialPrice, LaborHours FROM ProductionCosts WHERE RawMaterialPrice BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY LaborHours ASC;
SELECT AVG(RawMaterialPrice) AS AveragePrice, SUM(LaborHours) AS TotalLaborHours FROM ProductionCosts;
SELECT * FROM production_costs
SELECT id, total_cost, labor_hours FROM production_costs WHERE total_cost > 100
SELECT material_name, price FROM material_prices WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY material_name ASC
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM material_prices WHERE material_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT raw_material_price, total_cost FROM production_costs WHERE raw_material_price IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM production_costs WHERE labor_hours > 10 ORDER BY raw_material_price DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, labor_hours, total_cost FROM production_costs WHERE raw_material_price < 50 ORDER BY labor_hours ASC
SELECT id, raw_material_price, total_cost FROM production_costs WHERE total_cost BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY id

SELECT id, raw_material_price, labor_hours, total_cost FROM production_costs INNER JOIN material_prices ON production_costs.id = material_prices.material_id WHERE material_prices.price > 20 ORDER BY labor_hours DESC

SELECT production_costs.id, labor_hours, price FROM production_costs INNER JOIN material_prices ON production_costs.id = material_prices.material_id WHERE material_prices.material_name LIKE 'Steel%' ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT * FROM RawMaterials;
SELECT material_name, material_price FROM RawMaterials ORDER BY material_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductionCosts WHERE material_id = 2;
SELECT material_name, labor_position FROM RawMaterials JOIN LaborHours ON RawMaterials.material_id = LaborHours.labor_id;
SELECT SUM(production_cost) AS total_cost FROM ProductionCosts;
SELECT * FROM RawMaterials
SELECT * FROM LaborHours
SELECT material_name, material_price FROM RawMaterials ORDER BY material_price DESC
SELECT labor_position, labor_rate FROM LaborHours WHERE labor_rate > 20

SELECT production_cost, material_name, labor_position FROM ProductionCosts INNER JOIN RawMaterials ON ProductionCosts.material_id = RawMaterials.material_id INNER JOIN LaborHours ON ProductionCosts.labor_id = LaborHours.labor_id
SELECT * FROM RawMaterials;
SELECT material_name, material_price FROM RawMaterials ORDER BY material_price DESC;
SELECT labor_name, labor_rate FROM LaborHours WHERE labor_rate > 20;
SELECT production_id, total_cost FROM ProductionCosts WHERE total_cost < 1000;
SELECT budget_id, budget_amount FROM Budgeting;
SELECT * FROM RawMaterials;
SELECT material_name, material_price FROM RawMaterials WHERE material_price > 50;
SELECT labor_name FROM LaborHours ORDER BY labor_rate DESC;
SELECT production_id, total_cost FROM ProductionCosts WHERE total_cost < 1000 ORDER BY total_cost ASC;
SELECT budget_id, budget_amount FROM Budgeting WHERE budget_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM RawMaterials;
SELECT material_name, price_per_unit FROM RawMaterials WHERE price_per_unit > 100;
SELECT worker_id, worker_name, hourly_rate FROM LaborWorkers ORDER BY hourly_rate DESC;
SELECT record_id, production_date, units_produced FROM ProductionRecords WHERE units_produced < 1000 ORDER BY production_date ASC;
SELECT budget_id, budget_amount FROM Budgeting WHERE budget_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY budget_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM RawMaterials;
SELECT material_name, price_per_unit FROM RawMaterials ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT worker_name, hourly_rate FROM LaborWorkers WHERE hourly_rate > 20 ORDER BY hourly_rate DESC;

SELECT PR.production_date, RW.worker_name, RM.material_name, PR.units_produced FROM ProductionRecords PR JOIN LaborWorkers RW ON PR.worker_id = RW.worker_id JOIN RawMaterials RM ON PR.material_id = RM.material_id WHERE PR.units_produced > 100 ORDER BY PR.production_date DESC;
SELECT PC.total_cost, B.budget_amount FROM ProductionCosts PC JOIN Budgeting B ON PC.record_id = B.record_id WHERE PC.total_cost > 5000 AND B.budget_amount < 10000 ORDER BY PC.total_cost DESC;
